https://pipapou.itch.io/simultree

Simultree on Steam: 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3811840/Simultree/

Simultree is an incremental game about monitoring a life simulation.

Features:
- Run simulations to experiment with some entities that are trying to survive by eating fruits and reproducing.
- Unlock new entities, items, food and upgrade inside an endless tech tree.
- Compete in an online leaderboard.

 #clicker #incremental #roguelite
